intro:
Connect the spark, calm your mind.
A relaxing logic puzzle where each tap sparks a chain reaction across the grid.
description:
“Let the Current Flow. Feel the Calm.”   Voltline is a relaxing puzzle game where you guide electricity through intricate line networks by tapping the right connection points. Each tap sets off a satisfying chain reaction as the current spreads across the grid.
Every level introduces new layouts and unique interactive elements that shape the flow in different ways. It’s a calm yet engaging experience that rewards both focus and intuition.
With its soothing visuals and ambient sounds, Voltline is designed for players of all ages—easy to get into, but delightfully challenging to master.

Features:
•    One-tap gameplay focused on flow and reaction
•    Designed to relax your mind, not stress it
•    Special objects that shift how electricity behaves
•    Minimalist visuals with smooth, fluid animations
•    Soothing music and sound effects for a meditative vibe
•    100 handcrafted levels to unwind with at your own pace
